title: OpenOCR OCR Processing Request
description: A request to convert an image into text

img_url.description: The URL of the image to process.

engine_args.description: The OCR engine arguments to pass (engine-specific)

config_vars.description: Config vars - equivalent of -c args to tesseract

psm.description: Page Segment Mode, equivalent of -psm arg to tesseract

inplace_decode.description: If true, will attempt to do ocr decode in-place rather than queuing a message on RabbitMQ for worker processing.  Useful for local testing, not recommended for production.
